1238.45.text:
So we also use the
chat platform to--

1241.47.text:
the Hangouts platform, excuse
me-- to build our own bots.

1244.67.text:
So like Scott mentioned
earlier, we demoed the Meet bot

1248.02.text:
And the Meet bot uses natural
language processing and machine

1250.56.text:
intelligence to automatically
schedule a meeting for us.

1256.48.text:
So I'm going to switch over to
the Launch Coordination room.

1260.14.text:
And I think Mandy is going
to show us how it'll work.

1268.57.text:
So she asked the Meet
Bot to find a time today.

1271.03.text: And it wrote back with a card.

1273.09.text:
Now there's actually a lot
of really intelligent things

1276.10.text:
The Meet bot understands
things like today, tomorrow,

1278.99.text:
next week, next month,
two months from now.

1281.59.text:
It understands when
people are on vacation,

1284.08.text: when people are in the office.

1285.65.text:
It understands what time
zones people are in.

1287.56.text:
So if I have a meeting
with someone in Zurich,

1289.48.text:
we're not scheduling that
meeting at 11:30 PM for them.

1292.40.text:
You can do other things,
like reschedule the meeting.

1299.09.text:
So Mady moved the
meeting to tomorrow.

1301.81.text:
It rescheduled the
meeting to tomorrow.

1304.73.text:
It supports other
commands in the future,

1306.44.text:
like canceling the meeting,
adding additional people

1309.11.text:
to the meeting,
meeting right now,

1311.33.text:
and also just booking a
room for you, if you want

1316.20.text:
We're also going to be building
other bots in the future that

1319.35.text:
are very intelligent on top
of the Hangouts chat platform,

1321.77.text:
that we're going to be excited
to share with you in the coming

1324.68.text:
So I'm going to turn
it back over to Scott

1326.44.text: to jump back into the slides.

1338.81.text:
So that's at a high
level just a walk through

1345.57.text:
And three main areas
that we focused on,

1348.44.text:
direct messages,
which we support now

1350.41.text:
in classic Hangouts,
along with Presence,

1353.35.text:
we added virtual team
rooms for huddling around

1356.36.text:
projects, teams, topics, and
a new Hangouts platform that

1362.42.text:
supports everything from
scripting with Google Apps

1370.82.text:
Some of the key features
that we're launching

1373.73.text:
are ranged from search,
everything from free text

1376.67.text:
search to, as Mike
touched on, filtering

1380.48.text:
by people and types of
files, custom workflows

1384.44.text:
with Apps Script, Docs and
Drive integration, the Hangouts

1388.49.text:
platform itself, the
Meet bot that comes

1394.46.text:
with Hangouts chat and does
intelligent scheduling,

1397.61.text:
and enterprise readiness
across the Hangouts platform.

1404.63.text:
So high level, looking at
helping you connect easily,

1407.33.text:
get stuff done, and be
ready for your enterprise.
